languages.text: "Спрашиваешь — почему? Могла ли я верить {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}, элантах? После слов Муарана о том, что твой вид атаковал {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Крударах{/g}? После того, как я узрела частицу Крудараха в твоих покоях?" {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт полнится болью.{/n} "Я видела, как сердца мон-кай полнятся ненавистью ко мне и моим собратья. И как безразлич{mf|ен|на} к бедам моего народа ты. Что еще мне оставалось? Из двух горестей я выбрала ту, что ближе мне по родству крови".

traits.locale_text: "Я никогда не верила {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}, элантах. Особенно после слов Муарана о том, что твой вид атаковал {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Крударах{/g}. Ну а ты... Ты — {mf|один|одна} из них. Осторожно наблюдая за тобой, я старалась понять ваши мысли, мотивы, желания. Но лишь утопала в стихийности чувств и решений. А когда я узрела частицу Крудараха в твоих покоях, все как будто встало на свои места: мон-кай лгут. Они ненавидят меня и моих собратьев. Ты — ненавидишь и используешь меня". {n}В болезненном взгляде клубятся тени стыда.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Спрашиваешь — почему? Могла ли я верить {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}, элантах? После слов Муарана о том, что твой вид атаковал {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Крударах{/g}? После того, как я узрела частицу Крудараха в твоих покоях?" {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт полнится болью.{/n} "Я видела, как сердца мон-кай полнятся ненавистью ко мне и моим собратья. И как безразлич{mf|ен|на} к бедам моего народа ты. Что еще мне оставалось? Из двух горестей я выбрала ту, что ближе мне по родству крови".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."
languages.original_text: "Спрашиваешь — почему? Могла ли я верить {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g}, элантах? После слов Муарана о том, что твой вид атаковал {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Крударах{/g}? После того, как я узрела частицу Крудараха в твоих покоях?" {n}Взгляд Ирлиэт полнится болью.{/n} "Я видела, как сердца мон-кай полнятся ненавистью ко мне и моим собратья. И как безразлич{mf|ен|на} к бедам моего народа ты. Что еще мне оставалось? Из двух горестей я выбрала ту, что ближе мне по родству крови".

traits.locale_text: "I never trusted {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach. Doubly so after Muaran told me it was your species that attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}. As for you... You are one of them. By studying you I tried to divine your thoughts, motives, desires, but kept drowning in the spontaneity of decisions and emotions. And when I saw a shard of Crudarach in your chamber, everything fell into place: the mon-keigh lie. They hate me and my kin. You hate me and use me as you see fit." {n}Her pained gaze is clouded by shame.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I never trusted {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach. Doubly so after Muaran told me it was your species that attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}. As for you... You are one of them. By studying you I tried to divine your thoughts, motives, desires, but kept drowning in the spontaneity of decisions and emotions. And when I saw a shard of Crudarach in your chamber, everything fell into place: the mon-keigh lie. They hate me and my kin. You hate me and use me as you see fit." {n}Her pained gaze is clouded by shame.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have never trusted {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach. Especially after Muaran told me it was your species that attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}. As for you... you are one of them. By studying you I tried to divine your thoughts, motives, and desires, but instead found myself drowning in a maelstrom of emotions and choices. But when I saw a shard of Crudarach in your chamber, everything fell into place: mon-keigh lie. They hate me and my kin. You hate me and use me as you see fit." {n}Her pained gaze is clouded by shame.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你问我为什么？我怎么可能信任{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}，外界人？更何况，穆兰告诉我是你们的族人袭击了{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}克鲁达拉赫{/g}，我还在你的房间里看到了克鲁达拉赫的碎片。”{n}伊莉耶特的目光中充满了痛苦。{/n}“我亲眼看到，猴子对我和我的族人充满了仇恨，而你对我们面对的遭遇漠不关心。我又能怎么做呢？在两种悲伤之中，我选择了更接近血脉的那一种。”
languages.original_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."

traits.locale_text: “我从来都没有信任过{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}，外界人，尤其是当穆兰告诉我，是你们的种族袭击了{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}克鲁达拉赫{/g}之后。至于你……你也是他们的一员。我想要理解你，试图占卜你的思想、动机和欲望，但我却淹没在了情感与选择的漩涡之中。可当我回到我的房间，看到克鲁达拉赫的残骸时，我的心情再次归于平静——猴子们在说谎。他们痛恨我，也痛恨我的族人。你痛恨我，你打算把我当成顺手的工具来使用。”{n}她痛苦的目光中充满了羞愧的意味。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a mon-keigh, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked Crudarach? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."

languages.text: «¿Me preguntas por qué? ¿Cómo iba a confiar en los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? ¿Cómo, después de que Muaran me dijera que fue tu especie la que atacó {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? ¿De que viera un trozo de Crudarach en tus aposentos?». {n}La mirada de Yrliet está dolida.{/n} «Vi que los corazones de los mon-keigh están llenos de odio hacia mi pueblo y hacia mí. Y vi lo poco que te importaban los problemas de mi gente. ¿Qué iba a hacer? De los dos males, elegí el más cercano a mi sangre».
languages.original_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca he confiado en los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach. Especialmente después de que Muaran me dijera que fue tu especie la que atacó {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}. En cuanto a ti... eres un{mf|o|a} de ellos. Al estudiarte, he intentado adivinar tus pensamientos, motivos y deseos, pero, en lugar de conseguirlo, me he encontrado ahogada en un torbellino de emociones y decisiones. Sin embargo, cuando vi un fragmento de Crudarach en tus aposentos, todo me quedó muy claro: los mon-keigh mienten. Nos odian a mí y a mis hermanos. Me odias y me utilizas como te es conveniente». {n}Su mirada dolida está empañada por la vergüenza.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「理由だと？どうして{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}を信用できようか、エランタ？ムアランから{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}クルダラ{/g}を襲ったのはあなたの種族だと聞いたのだぞ？あなたの部屋でクルダラの一部を見たのだぞ？」{n}ユリエットはキッとこちらを見る。{/n}「モン＝ケイの心は、私と我が同族への憎しみで溢れているのだな。それに、あなたは我が同族の問題を気にも留めない。他にどうしろと？ ふたつの悲しみのうち、私は血筋が近い方に寄り添ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、私は{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}を信用したことはない。特にムアランから、{g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}クルダラ{/g}を襲ったのはあなた方の種族だと聞いた後ではな。あなたは…彼らの仲間だ。あなたを研究することで、その考え、動機、欲望を読み取ろうとした。だが、その代わりに、感情や選択の渦に溺れている自分に気づいた。しかし、あなたの部屋でクルダラの破片を見たとき、すべてが腑に落ちた。モン＝ケイは嘘をつくものだ、と。彼らは私と私の同族を憎んでいる。あなたは私を憎み、好きなように私を利用している」{n}彼女の苦痛に満ちたまなざしは、落胆で曇っていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr fragt nach dem Grund? Wie ich einem {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} vertrauen konnte, Elantach? Nachdem ich von Muaran erfahren hatte, dass der Angriff auf {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g} von Euresgleichen ausgeführt worden war? Nachdem ich in Euren Gemächern ein Stück von Crudarach gefunden hatte?" {n}Yrliets Blick ist voller Schmerz.{/n} "Ich sah, dass die Herzen der Chem-Pan-Sey voller Hass auf mich und die Meinen waren. Und ich sah, wie gleichgültig Euch die Probleme meiner Art ließen. Was hätte ich sonst tun sollen? Ich wähle von zwei Schmerzen den aus, der meinem Blut näher stand."
languages.original_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe den {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g} nie vertraut, Elantach Erst recht, nachdem ich von Muaran erfahren hatte, dass der Angriff auf {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g} von Eurer Spezies ausgeführt worden war. Und was Euch angeht ... Ihr seid {mf|einer|eine} von ihnen. Ich habe Euch studiert, um Eure Gedanken, Motive und Begierden zu ergründen, doch stattdessen wurde ich in einen Mahlstrom von Optionen und Entscheidungen hinabgezogen. Als ich jedoch in Eurer Kammer einen Splitter von Crudarach fand, fügte sich alles: Chem-Pan-Sey lügen. Sie hassen mich und mein Volk. Ihr hasst mich und nutzt mich aus, wie es Euch dient." {n}Ihr schmerzerfüllter Blick ist getrübt von Schmach.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vous me demandez pourquoi j'ai agi ainsi ? Comment aurais-je pu faire confiance à {mf|un|une} {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} après avoir appris de la bouche de Muaran que c'était votre espèce qui avait attaqué {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g} ? Après avoir vu de mes yeux un fragment de mon monde dans vos quartiers ? {n}lâche-t-elle avec un regard dolent.{/n} J'ai bien vu à quel point les mon-keigh nous haïssaient, moi et les miens, et votre indifférence envers le sort de mon peuple ne m'a pas échappé. Que vouliez-vous que je fasse ? Entre deux maux, j'ai choisi celui qui me rapprochait le plus de mes semblables. »
languages.original_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai jamais fait confiance aux {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach, encore moins après que Muaran m'a appris que c'était votre espèce qui avait attaqué {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}. Et vous... vous êtes {mf|un|une} mon-keigh. Je vous ai {mf|étudié|étudiée} pour tenter de deviner vos pensées, vos motivations et vos désirs, mais tout ce que j'y ai gagné, c'est de me noyer dans un maelström d'émotions et de choix. Cependant, quand j'ai vu un fragment de Crudarach dans vos quartiers, toutes les pièces du puzzle se sont mises en place : les mon-keigh mentent. Ils nous détestent, mes semblables et moi. Vous me détestez et vous servez de moi comme bon vous semble. » {n}La douleur aussi bien que la honte se lisent dans son regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Neden yaptığımı mı soruyorsun? Bir {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh'e{/g} nasıl güvenebilirdim elantach? Muaran'dan {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach'a{/g} saldıranın senin halkın olduğunu işittikten ve odanda gözüme Crudarach'ın bir parçası iliştikten sonra hem de..." {n}Yrliet'in bakışlarına acı hâkim.{/n} "Mon-keigh yüreklerinin hem bana hem de soydaşlarıma karşı nasıl öfkeyle dolduğunu gördüm. Senin de soydaşlarımın dertlerine nasıl kayıtsız kaldığını gördüm. Başka ne yapsaydım? Bu iki kader arasından kanımla bağı olanı seçtim."
languages.original_text: "You are asking why? How could I have trusted a {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, elantach? After Muaran told me that it was your kind that had attacked {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}? After I glimpsed a piece of Crudarach in your chambers?" {n}Yrliet's gaze is pained.{/n} "I saw that mon-keigh hearts were full of hatred for me and my kin. And I saw how indifferent you were to the troubles of my kind. What else was I to do? Of the two sorrows, I chose the one that was closer to my blood."

traits.locale_text: "Neden yaptığımı mı soruyorsun? Bir {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}'e nasıl güvenebilirdim elantach? Muaran'dan {g|Encyclopedia:Craftworld}Crudarach{/g}'a saldıranın senin halkın olduğunu işittikten ve odanda gözüme Crudarach'ın bir parçası iliştikten sonra hem de..." {n}Yrliet'in bakışlarında acı hâkim.{/n} "Mon-keigh yüreklerinin hem bana hem de soydaşlarıma karşı nasıl öfkeyle dolduğunu gördüm. Senin de soydaşlarımın dertlerine nasıl kayıtsız kaldığını gördüm. Başka ne yapsaydım? Ben de bu iki kader arasından kanımla bağı olanı seçtim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
